status: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes whose status matches one of the specified values
startTime: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes whose start date and time is within the specified range
assignment: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes whose assignment status matches one of the specified values
orderedVehicleType: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes ordered vehicle type matches one of the specified values
teams: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes ordered vehicle type matches one of the specified values
tags: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes that have all the specified tags
pickupNearby: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes whose first pickup is near the specified location
ownerIds: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes owned by one of the specified owner IDs
createdTime: When this filter is applied, you will only see routes created within the specified time range
